title: China launches Shijian-25 satellite to test on-orbit refueling and mission extension technologies
summary:
HELSINKI — China has kicked off its 2025 launch activities with the successful launch of the Shijian-25 satellite, aiming to advance key technologies for on-orbit refueling and extending satellite lifespans. […]
The post China launches Shijian-25 satellite to test on-orbit refueling and mission extension technologies appeared first on SpaceNews.
